name: Qingxin Flower Cake
desc: A cake made from flowers. Prepared with Qingxin petals still glistening with their morning dew, the filling is wrapped in many layers consisting of two different types of pastry — a flaky crust and a buttery dough. Baked to perfection, Qingxin Flower Cakes are best enjoyed fresh from the oven.

customize.name: Recipe: Qingxin Flower Cake
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Qingxin Flower Cake.

customize.name: Delicious Qingxin Flower Cake
customize.desc: A cake made from flowers. With a gentle bite, the blossoms swaying in the mountains seem to bloom in your mouth, and the fragrance of flowers feels as if it seeps into your very soul. As you reluctantly finish the last bite, a faint, lingering scent remains on your fingers...

customize.name: Suspicious Qingxin Flower Cake
customize.desc: A cake made from flowers. The dry, hard texture and bland flavor bear no resemblance to the delicate nature that flowers should possess. One can't help but wonder if the filling is actually made of scraps of paper...

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.

customize.name: Jade-Cut Flowers
customize.desc: Lan Yan's specialty. Before you, a young girl lowers her head, focused on weaving something with great care... In no time at all, a delicate rattan bowl appears in your hands, holding exquisite silver swallows and fragrant pastries. The girl's sincere, innocent smile seems almost like a spell, urging you to take a bite, and as you do, the flavors linger delightfully on your palate.

customize.name: Qingxin Flower Cake
customize.desc: A cake made from flowers. Prepared with Qingxin petals still glistening with their morning dew, the filling is wrapped in many layers consisting of two different types of pastry — a flaky crust and a buttery dough. Baked to perfection, Qingxin Flower Cakes are best enjoyed fresh from the oven.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.
